title: Surrender Shadowheart to Viconia
content:
with Viconia. We must press on.

Surrender Shadowheart to Viconia Walkthrough

Proceed into the Cloister of Sombre Embrace inside the house of Grief to meet Viconia. You need to choose between Shadowheart or Sharran followers. You will have to make a choice here.

Defending Shadowheart leads to a fight with Viconia and Sharran disciples. Surrender Shadowheart and Lady Shar's faithful will join you in Gather Your Allies quest.

Your dialogue will be the following:

She's all yours Never.
